doc.title: Andrzej Krauze on Silvio Berlusconi's return to Italian politics – cartoon
doc.author: Andrzej Krauze
doc.description: Silvio Berlusconi is aiming for a comeback in an alliance with the far right ahead of Italy’s 4 March elections
